snippet.title: Dawn of Mages - Gameplay Trailer [Early Access Release Date March 29th 2024]
snippet.description:
Are you ready? Countdown has officially started! 

We are proud to introduce you to the world of Dawn of Mages.

Attest your supremacy in this new PvP Battle Arena. Make use of your skills, strategies and cunning in this magical world with uniquely intricate maps, a free targeting system and over 100 different builds.

Lay down the classical guns, the sword&board and join the fight in this world of reality shaping spells.

Build your character and dominate your enemies with a unique build (out of over 100 possible).

Release date: Early Access - March 29th

Follow us on:

https://discord.com/invite/fDWNXxvnY3

https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?...
 
https://dawnofmages.com/
  
 https://twitter.com/TS_DawnOfMages
 
 https://www.instagram.com/TS_Dawn_Of_Mages/

https://www.tiktok.com/@dawnofmages_pvp

NOTE: Dawn of Mages will NEVER be pay-to-win. While there is an in-game marketplace, it will feature COSMETIC only items.

Game developed and produced by Two Shrinks

About Two Shrinks
Two Shrinks is a project started out of love for gaming and a desire to create and offer something different and unique, yet familiar. As the name says, we are a team of two shrinks bound by one dream.

Dawn of Mages is our first project. We started working on it 3 years ago and the journey couldn’t have been more interesting. Join us as we near the fruition of our effort and be a part of what the future of this game holds.

https://dawnofmages.com/
